headline: Jim Cramer on Devon Energy Corporation (DVN): ‘I’m Holding Off For Now Because Oil Is So Weak’
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Jim Cramer’s Lightning Round: 7 Stocks to Watch. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Devon Energy Corporation (NYSE:DVN) stands against the other stocks to watch. Jim Cramer, host of Mad Money, recently shared his thoughts following his interview with President-elect Donald Trump on […]

headline: Top oil and gas sector deals in 2024
summary: The biggest deals in the global hydrocarbon sector this year ranged from $3.3bn to $26bn in value with a continued focus on consolidation.
